description: This Python source file contains utility functions for a Streamlit-based web application, specifically for managing chat messages, displaying tool call results, session management, and about information for an agentic RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) assistant.

methods.name: add_message
methods.description: Adds a message to the session state, ensuring the messages list exists and appending the new message with role, content, and optional tool calls.

methods.name: export_chat_history
methods.description: Exports the chat history from session state as a markdown-formatted string, including roles and tool usage.

methods.name: display_tool_calls
methods.description: Displays a list of tool call results within a Streamlit container, with expandable sections for details like arguments, results, and metrics.

methods.name: rename_session_widget
methods.description: Provides a widget in the sidebar to rename the current session of the agent, updating the agent's session name.

methods.name: session_selector_widget
methods.description: Displays a session selector in the sidebar, allowing users to switch between saved sessions, loading messages and tools accordingly.

methods.name: about_widget
methods.description: Displays an about section in the sidebar with information about the application.
